methods.name: getDefaultSubscriptionsEvaluatedFromParentTenant
methods.rawdescription: Gets the default subscriptions configuration inherited from parent tenant.
methods.description: Gets the default subscriptions configuration inherited from parent tenant.

jsdoctags.comment: The default subscriptions object with settings from parent tenant.

methods.name: getDefaultSubscriptionsFromCurrentTenant
methods.rawdescription: Gets the default subscriptions configuration from the current tenant.
methods.description: Gets the default subscriptions configuration from the current tenant.

jsdoctags.comment: The default subscriptions object with settings from the current tenant.

methods.name: getSubscribableTenantApps
methods.rawdescription:
Gets the list of applications which can be used in default subscriptions, i.e.:
- current tenant's all own applications,
- inherited applications, which do not have the same names as current tenant's own apps.
The list is sorted alphabetically by humanized app name and contains up to 2000 items.
methods.description:
Gets the list of applications which can be used in default subscriptions, i.e.:

  • current tenant's all own applications,
  • inherited applications, which do not have the same names as current tenant's own apps. The list is sorted alphabetically by humanized app name and contains up to 2000 items.

jsdoctags.comment: The list of applications, which can be used in default subscriptions.

methods.name: saveDefaultSubscriptionsToCurrentTenant
methods.rawdescription:
Saves given default subscriptions configuration to the current tenant
(either sets, updates, or deletes corresponding tenant options).
methods.description: Saves given default subscriptions configuration to the current tenant (either sets, updates, or deletes corresponding tenant options).

jsdoctags.comment: The default subscriptions configuration to be saved.
